-L-cQdbBqhOky5u6Ms_V.text: Congratulations! You have been chosen to receive Loloi Javari JV-08 Area Rug for RugStudio  in exchange for a creative post about the product. We'll ship the product soon. Please remember to follow the guidelines of the product post and respond here with any questions!

-L-cS3KyIfpBwIiY8SOD.text: What size were you interested in? We can sell it to you at a very deep discount, or ship you one for free though we would need it returned, or dropped off at our Austin store. Let me know, thanks!

-L-d-YcOXu-TgIQdZ0aR.text: Thanks for accepting me üòÅ. I don't think the rental option would work well for me, as it's a bit of hassle and my days are pretty busy. Would you mind explaining the discount? Thanks

-L-d4PE4fj1WVcT4MS3U.text:
You're welcome, thank you for applying! 

We completely understand about returning the rug. For the discount option it would depend on the size you want. Take the 8x10 (7'10''x10') for example; we sell that for $899 on the site. The discount we can offer for that size would be about 50% and would bring the final price to $425.

-L-dMlAIedyPkt3yF9xa.text: Ohh I see. I think that's a bit too expensive for me right now, but I appreciate it! Beautiful rug üòÅ
